trans-unit.source: Initiates an asynchronous operation to download the contents of a blob to a file.
trans-unit.target: Initiates an asynchronous operation to download the contents of a blob to a file.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the path to the target file.
trans-unit.target: A string containing the path to the target file.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.IO.FileMode</codeEntityReference> enumeration value that determines how to open or create the file.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.IO.FileMode</codeEntityReference> enumeration value that determines how to open or create the file.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task</codeEntityReference> object that represents the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task</codeEntityReference> object that represents the asynchronous operation.
